item.title: Debt and SMEs in New Zealand
item.description:
In this video, I dive into debt funding for small to medium businesses in New Zealand. While headlines often talk about how “cheap” money is, especially for homeowners, the reality for SMEs is quite different.

I explore what current lending conditions mean for small businesses and share recommendations to help improve access to funding.
